name: Pocket Dungeon (Sir Shoe, Ninja Dev, RoyalGuardians)

description:
Participation for Minijam 45.

Controls:

<  - left

>  - right

Z  - attack

space - jump

Sorry for the bugs and another endless game, we had development problems and only 12 hours to make the game.
